examples: Social interaction is crucial for child development.
The interaction between the two chemicals caused an explosion.
The prices vary depending on the season.
Opinions on this issue vary widely.
Please wear appropriate attire for the ceremony.
It is appropriate to apologize when you make a mistake.

Her quiet demeanor, by contrast, made her stand out in the lively group.

The government needs to approve the proposal.
He demonstrated his skill on the piano.

explanation.meaning: 发生的事情；严重事件；冲突
examples: The police are investigating the incident.
There was a minor incident at the party.
The suspect is awaiting trial.
They are conducting a trial of the new drug.
There was a slight delay in the schedule.
He has a slight fever.
She was slightly embarrassed.
The color is slightly different.

explanation.meaning: 双胞胎之一的；孪生之一的
examples: She has a twin sister.
They live in a twin house.
He is the twin who lives in London.
The twins look very similar.

explanation.meaning: 不涉及言语的；非言语的
examples: Nonverbal communication includes body language.
She's good at reading nonverbal cues.
The assessment of the damage is still ongoing.
Students will undergo a skills assessment.
It's difficult to assess the damage.
We need to assess the risks involved.
The company is undergoing internal restructuring.
He suffered internal injuries.
Please straighten up your room.
He straightened up and faced the audience.
He slumped into the chair, exhausted.
Sales slumped dramatically last month.

explanation.meaning: 故作姿态； (为画像、拍照等摆的)姿势
examples: The model held a difficult pose for the artist.
She struck a dramatic pose for the camera.
She posed for a photograph.
The children posed awkwardly for the family portrait.
The heavy traffic poses a threat to pedestrians.
This situation poses a serious problem.
The road bends sharply to the left.
He bent down to pick up the coin.
The investigation revealed the truth.
Her smile revealed her happiness.

explanation.meaning: 使更清晰易懂；阐明；澄清
examples: Could you clarify what you mean?
The teacher clarified the instructions for the students.
He's a workaholic; in other words, he spends all his time working.
She was not satisfied with the result; in other words, she wanted a complete rewrite.

explanation.meaning: 教师；教育工作者；教育家
examples: She is a dedicated educator.
Many educators believe in lifelong learning.

explanation.meaning: (短暂地)访问；要求(某人讲话等)； 正式邀请

Don't bother to call me.
Does it bother you that he's late?

explanation.meaning: 有某种影响；在 T 作

explanation.meaning: (对……起反应；回应； (对食物等) 有不良反应
examples: How did he react to the news?

Trust is a key component of a good relationship.
